'''HafĂžĂłr JĂşlĂ­us BjĂśrnsson''' is an Icelandic strongman.

He took over the role of [[Gregor Clegane|Gregor "The Mountain That Rides" Clegane]] for the [[Season 4|fourth]] and [[Season 5|fifth]] seasons. He stands at 6 feet 9 inches tall (2.06 m), and weighs nearly 400 pounds.<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/08/mountain-recast/ Winter Is Coming]</ref>

After a short lived professional basketball career in Iceland, BjĂśrnsson injured his knee forcing an early retirement from the sport, he then in 2008 met [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Magn%C3%BAs_Ver_Magn%C3%BAsson MagnĂşs Ver MagnĂşsson], a 4 time Worlds Strongest Man winner who said HafĂžĂłr seemed a good prospect for a strongman. In 2010 he came 3rd in Iceland's Strongest Man, and has won every year since then. He has also won Europe's Strongest Man in 2014 and has appeared in 4 World's Strongest Man finals through 2011-2014, finishing in 6th, 3rd, 3rd, and 2nd respectively. Only narrowly missing the title in 2014 to Lithuanian 4x World's Strongest Man winner, and friend of HafĂžĂłr's, [[Wikipedia:Ĺ˝ydrĹŤnas Savickas|Ĺ˝ydrĹŤnas Savickas]]  Savickas was the previous reigning champion as Europe's Strongest Man since 2010, but did not compete in 2014 (Savickas won in 2010, 2012, and 2013, but the Europe's Strongest Man competition was on hiatus in 2011 and no champion was named that year).
